item.description:
Woohoo! Josh from Lost in the Beer Aisle is throwing another Craft Beer Tweet-up!

Description

The Boston craft beer tweet-up is a FREE social networking event intended for anyone who loves beer. Many of the attendees will be from the Boston-area beer blogging community as well as beer-lovers from Twitter. The event will be casual. No agenda. Come, drink, talk beer, make friends.

People new to the craft-beer scene should not hesitate to join us; you won't find anything intimidating about the event...folks with all levels of beer-knowledge will be represented.

If traveling by car, please consider bringing a designated driver.



Hashtag

When tweeting about the event, please feel free to use the #LIBAcraftbeerup hash tag.



Location

American Craft - Brookline, MA

American Craft is one of Boston's best locations to drink awesome craft beer. The awesome folks down at American Craft will provide us appetizers on the house. There will also be some unnamed special "treats".: Hint: Leftovers from American Craft Beer Week.


Time/Date

Saturday June 26th. 1pm - 4pm.

Door prizes drawing at 3:00.



Directions & Parking

Use Google or your GPS. Directions should be straight forward.

Street parking is ample in this section of town. Bring quarters for the meters.


Door Prizes
Bring your business card for a chance to win fabulous prizes. Blank cards will be made available for folks without business cards.

Drawing will be held at 3:00. Must be present to win!
item.name: Boston Craft Beer Tweet-up
